column2: title=Edgar Rice Burroughs: Master of Adventure
image=[[Image:Edgar Rice Burroughs - Master of Adventure.jpg

column1: '''''Edgar Rice Burroughs: Master of Adventure''''' is a book which investigates the work of [[wikipedia:Edgar Rice Burroughs
column2: Edgar Rice Burroughs]]. The book includes a brief extract (pp. 246-247) from [[Letter to Richard Lupoff
column3: a letter to Richard Lupoff]] from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'' at Tolkienbooks.net</ref>
